content.query:
DECLARE @jsonStr VARCHAR(MAX);
DECLARE @langStr VARCHAR(MAX);
SELECT @jsonStr=
     JSON_QUERY(jsonContent, '$.Results') 
     FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://dlssynap1.dfs.core.windows.net/lf-data/calisto/agent/AgentData_20211001000000.JSON',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonContent varchar(MAX)
    ) AS [result]
    ;
SELECT * FROM  
 OPENJSON ( @jsonStr )  
WITH (   
              AgentNumber   varchar(200) '$.AgentNumber'  ,
              LangArr nvarchar(MAX) N'$' AS JSON  
 )
